title: Two out
brief_description: Utilising only one shot and a series of dissolves and jump cuts, this powerful short film examines the relationship between two men who share a single gaol cell. When the subject of the lack of the female object emerges, the tiny space they inhabit erupts into violence and frustrated desire.
